statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score, exam_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, exam_score, assignment_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score, exam_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score, exam_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score, exam_score FROM StudentProgress ORDER BY exam_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score, exam_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE quiz_score < 70 ORDER BY assignment_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score, exam_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE assignment_score < 60 AND exam_score > 70 ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score FROM StudentProgress ORDER BY assignment_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, exam_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_score > 80;
SELECT quiz_id, student_id, quiz_date FROM QuizRecords WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY quiz_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, SUM(quiz_score) AS total_quiz_score FROM QuizRecords GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_score > 80 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score FROM StudentProgress LEFT JOIN QuizRecords ON StudentProgress.student_id = QuizRecords.student_id WHERE QuizRecords.quiz_score > 90;
SELECT MAX(quiz_score) AS highest_quiz_score, MIN(assignment_score) AS lowest_assignment_score FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT AVG(quiz_score) AS avg_quiz_score, AVG(assignment_score) AS avg_assignment_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_score < 70;
SELECT student_id, quiz_date FROM QuizRecords ORDER BY quiz_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM QuizProgress WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY completed_at DESC
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, grade FROM AssignmentProgress WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY grade ASC
SELECT MAX(result) AS max_result FROM ExamProgress WHERE exam_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, completed_at FROM QuizProgress ORDER BY completed_at ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM QuizProgress
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score, completed_at FROM QuizProgress WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY completed_at DESC;
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, grade, submitted_at FROM AssignmentProgress WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY grade ASC;
SELECT student_id, exam_id, result, taken_at FROM ExamProgress WHERE result >= 90 ORDER BY taken_at DESC;
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, grade, submitted_at FROM AssignmentProgress WHERE submitted_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY submitted_at ASC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score, completed_at FROM QuizProgress WHERE score <= 50 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_class FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_class='Math';
SELECT exam_id, exam_score FROM exams WHERE student_id=1;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_class, quiz_score FROM students JOIN quizzes ON students.student_id = quizzes.student_id WHERE quiz_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, assignment_score, exam_score FROM assignments FULL OUTER JOIN exams ON assignments.student_id = exams.student_id;
SELECT student_name, exam_score FROM students JOIN exams ON students.student_id = exams.student_id WHERE student_class = 'Mathematics';
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_score > 80;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT quiz_date, quiz_score FROM quizzes WHERE student_id = 456 ORDER BY quiz_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, assignment_score FROM students JOIN assignments ON students.student_id = assignments.student_id;
SELECT exam_id, exam_date FROM exams WHERE student_id = 789 ORDER BY exam_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_score > 80 ORDER BY quiz_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY student_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, exam_score FROM students JOIN exams ON students.student_id = exams.student_id WHERE exam_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY exam_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_score FROM assignments WHERE assignment_due_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assignment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, quiz_score FROM students JOIN quizzes ON students.student_id = quizzes.student_id WHERE quiz_score < 50 ORDER BY student_name ASC LIMIT 5;
